answerText: Cry, the Beloved Country[10] This minister of Sophiatown guides Kumalo through the town and the people they encounter, and helps him find Absalom.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | 7 | 5 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: After James Jarvis learns of the murder of his son, he begins to learn more about Arthur through writings. FTPE: [10] Name this novel by Alan Paton that centers on Stephen Kumalo's search for his son, Absalom.
